thread.title: Future's New Album Is Available In International Markets
thread.title_full: Future's New Album Is Available In International Markets

author: Shaun M
title: Future's New Album Is Available In International Markets
text:
Home > Music > Future's New Album Is Available In International Markets Future's New Album Is Available In International Markets 0 0 Posted by Shaun M , Feb 16, 2017 at 10:09am Future just dropped his new album a day early. 
Fans were caught off guard on Valentine's Day when Atlanta favorite Future announced a new album and a tour. Turns out his self-titled Future that was supposed to be released Friday just hit international stores a day early. 
Though still not available in North America, the brand new 17-track project has apparently no guest features. Its first single "Poppin Tags" is already out with a video. 
Future also announced the Nobody Safe tour this week. Kicking off May 4 in Memphis, the shows will feature Kodak Black , Migos , Tory Lanez , Young Ferg, A$AP Ferg and Future himself. 
Future will answer Zane Lowe's questions on Beats 1 radio Thursday. In the preview to the show, the rapper mentioned he likes to "keep you guessing." 
Watch for the North American release of his fifth studio album Friday.
